打って掛かる: (うってかかる) - to attack; to strike; to take a swing at
打っ付かる: (ぶっつかる) - to strike against/to collide with/to bump into/to conflict; to encounter/to meet; to clash
打っ付ける: (ぶっつける) - to hit (e.g. one's head)/to strike/to crash into; to throw (e.g. a ball, a question, a demand); to express/to vent (e.g. one's anger)
打っ倒れる: (ぶったおれる) - to fall flat; to collapse in a heap
打っ切る: (ぶっきる) - to violently cut something apart; to hack down; to chop; to cut off
打っ切れる: (ぶっきれる) - to suddenly break with a snap/to suddenly get cut off; to snap/to become furious
打っ千切り: (ぶっちぎり) - opening up a big margin over one's nearest rival
打っ千切る: (ぶっちぎる) - to win (a race) by a wide margin; to slash though something/to tear (off)
打っ叩く: (ぶったたく) - to beat vigorously; to rain stikes upon someone; to tan someone's hide; to mericlessly pummel; to beat the daylights out of
打っ壊す: (ぶっこわす) - to destroy/to crush/to break by striking/to wreck; to spoil/to ruin
打っ手切る: (ぶったぎる) - to chop (a branch, etc.)
打っ手繰る: (ぶったくる) - to overcharge; to rip off; to rob; to soak
打っ掛け: (ぶっかけ) - splashing on/splashing at; dish made by pouring broth over something (esp. bukkakesoba); ejaculation onto someone's face
打っ掛ける: (ぶっかける) - to dash (e.g. liquid on someone's face); to slosh; to splash; to souse; to pour
打っ掛け蕎麦: (ぶっかけそば) - soba with broth poured over it
打っ掛け飯: (ぶっかけめし) - rice with other ingredients poured on top
打っ棄る: (うっちゃる) - to discard/to abandon; to neglect/to let be
打っ欠き氷: (ぶっかきごおり) - chipped ice; ice chips
打っ欠く: (ぶっかく) - to break into pieces; to chip off
打っ殺す: (ぶっころす) - to beat to death; to kill
打っ毀す: (ぶっこわす) - to destroy/to crush/to break by striking/to wreck; to spoil/to ruin
打っ潰す: (ぶっつぶす) - to smash violently; to crush
打っ込み: (ブッコミ) - hitting/throwing/mixing/wearing; bottom fishing/legering; gap between pegs in a pachinko machine (that a ball can pass through)
打っ込み釣り: (ぶっこみづり) - bottom fishing; legering
打っ込む: (ぶっこむ) - to hit/to strike/to smash/to hammer in/to drive in; to throw/to toss/to cast; to mix; to wear (sword, etc.)/to carry
打っ通し: (ぶっとおし) - continuous; nonstop; consecutive; ceaseless
打っ違い: (ぶっちがい) - diagonal cross; x-shaped cross
打っ遣らかす: (うっちゃらかす) - to leave unfinished; to abandon
打っ遣る: (うっちゃる) - to discard/to abandon; to neglect/to let be
打っ飛ばす: (ぶっとばす) - to strike (as to send flying)/to beat/to knock; to jump with force/to leap; to accomplish a task very rapidly; to drive at full speed (e.g. a car)
打っ飛ぶ: (ぶっとぶ) - to jump/to leap with great strength; to lack common sense; to be extremely surprised (by)
打つ: (utsu) - to hit, to strike, to knock, to beat, to punch, to slap, to tap, to bang, to clap, to pound; to strike (meio-dia, etc.), to sound (cymbals, etc.), to beat (a drum, etc.) , to hit, to strike, to knock, to beat, to punch, to slap, to tap, to bang, to clap, to pound; to strike (noon, etc.), to sound (cymbals, etc.), to beat (a drum, etc.); to beat (rhythmically, e.g. pulse, waves, etc.); to move, to impress, to touch
打つかり: (ぶつかり) - collision/bumping into; {sumo}  head-to-head training/drill consisting of pushing and being pushed/battering practice
打つかり合う: (ぶつかりあう) - to collide; to clash
打つかり稽古: (ぶつかりげいこ) - {sumo} head-to-head training; drill consisting of pushing and being pushed; battering practice
打つかる: (ぶつかる) - to strike against/to collide with/to bump into/to conflict; to encounter/to meet; to clash
打つ切り: (ぶつぎり) - chunk; lump; thick slice; cutting into chunks
打つ手がない: (うつてがない) - no way to do; nothing can be done
打てば響く: (うてばひびく) - (often as 打てば響くような) to be responsive; to show immediate results
打ん投げる: (ぶんなげる) - to throw (strongly, violently, etc.)
打ん殴る: (ぶんなぐる) - to knock; to hit hard; to give a hard blow; to wallop; to sock
打上げ: (うちあげ) - launching/launch; end (of a theatrical run, etc.); closing party (e.g. a theater show)/cast party/party to celebrate successful completion of a project
打上げる: (ぶちあげる) - to make a bold speech; to make a bold statement
打付ける: (ぶちつける) - to hit (e.g. one's head)/to strike/to crash into; to throw (e.g. a ball, a question, a demand); to express/to vent (e.g. one's anger)
打伏す: (うちふす) - to mask oneself; to lie down
打倒: (だとう) - knockdown (e.g. in boxing); overthrow; defeat
打克つ: (うちかつ) - (打ち勝つ, 打勝つ only) to conquer (e.g. an enemy)/to defeat; to overcome (a difficulty); (打ち勝つ, 打勝つ only) to out-hit
打出し: (うちだし) - embossing a pattern/repoussé/hammering; drum signaling the end of a performance; serve (e.g. in tennis)/drive (in golf)
打出の小槌: (うちでのこづち) - magic mallet; lucky mallet; nursery-tale mallet that delivers one's heart's desire at a wave
打刀: (うちがたな) - katana; var. of Japanese long sword
打切り: (うちきり) - end; close; finish; truncation; discontinuance
打切る: (うちきる) - to stop; to abort; to discontinue; to close
打刻: (だこく) - to impress/to engrave/to incise; to stamp (e.g. symbol)/to punch
打割羽織: (ぶっさきばおり) - haori coat used by soldiers
打勝つ: (うちかつ) - (打ち勝つ, 打勝つ only) to conquer (e.g. an enemy)/to defeat; to overcome (a difficulty); (打ち勝つ, 打勝つ only) to out-hit
打取る: (うちとる) - to kill (with a weapon); to defeat an opponent; {baseb} to get someone out; to arrest/to take prisoner
打合う: (うちあう) - to fight; to exchange blows; to rally
打合せ: (うちあわせ) - advance arrangements/preparatory meeting/briefing session; overlap (of a coat, etc.); making something match exactly
打合せる: (うちあわせる) - to knock together; to arrange (e.g. a meeting)
打合わせ: (うちあわせ) - advance arrangements/preparatory meeting/briefing session; overlap (of a coat, etc.); making something match exactly
打合わせる: (うちあわせる) - to knock together; to arrange (e.g. a meeting)
打守る: (うちまもる) - to stare at; to closely defend
打席: (だせき) - {baseb} batter's box; one's turn at bat
打感: (だかん) - feeling of a golf club hitting a ball
打手: (うちて) - shooter; (打ち手, 打手 only) drummer (taiko, etc.)
打払う: (うちはらう) - to brush away/to sweep aside; to repel (e.g. enemy)/to drive away/to rout
打抜き: (うちぬき) - punching (e.g. with a die)
打振る: (うちふる) - to brandish; to flourish; to wave; to swing; to shake at
打捨てる: (うちすてる) - to throw away; to abandon
打捨る: (うちすてる) - to throw away; to abandon
打掛: (うちかけ) - women's bridal robe with trailing skirts worn over a kimono; (打ち掛け only) ending play for the day/leaving a game unfinished (esp. Go)
打掛け: (うちかけ) - women's bridal robe with trailing skirts worn over a kimono; (打ち掛け only) ending play for the day/leaving a game unfinished (esp. Go)
打揚げ: (うちあげ) - launching/launch; end (of a theatrical run, etc.); closing party (e.g. a theater show)/cast party/party to celebrate successful completion of a project
打揚げる: (うちあげる) - to launch/to shoot up; (of waves) to dash/to wash up (ashore); to finish (e.g. a theater run, sumo tournament)/to close; to report (to boss, etc.)
打撃戦: (だげきせん) - game with many hits
打撃数: (だげきすう) - number of blows (used in measuring the b.p.m. of an air hammer, etc.); (number of) at bats
打撃練習: (だげきれんしゅう) - {baseb} batting practice
打撲: (だぼく) - blow; hit (on the body); beating
打放し: (うちはなし) - undressed concrete/unfaced concrete; (golf) driving range
打明ける: (うちあける) - to be frank; to speak one's mind; to open one's heart
打明け話: (うちあけばなし) - confession; confidential talk; frank talk
打止め: (うちどめ) - end (of an entertainment or match)
打止める: (うちとめる) - (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) to hammer into place; (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) (also うちどめる) to end (a performance); (撃ち止める refers esp. to a gun, and 討ち止める to a blade) to kill/to slay/to shoot dead/to cut down
